Yes

This game is a wonderful experience to a Steven Universe fan! It has just a little of everything that makes the show so great, but with a story disconnected from the plot of the show, which makes how canon to the show this game is irrelevant. The unique battle system, beautiful areas, and amazing music make this game a must play for any Steven Universe fan.

I do just want to mention one glaring flaw that makes this game a cakewalk if you know it, which due to the time I‚Äôm writing this review will most likely never be patched. If you use a white star fruit in battle then start the entire area over from the battle, all attacks will be free for the rest of the area. Maybe use it if you are struggling... or not.
Bugs out and restarts when about to win a fight. Yet still plays the audio from the fight, Please fix this

This game is pretty great; it plays like the original Paper Mario or Mario and Luigi games. Timing-based action commands make it one of my favorite games for iOS. The only issue I have with the game is that the badge system seems to be buggy. I will equip badges but they don‚Äôt show up after one battle during which they are equipped. The badges appear grayed out until I quit the game and try again.

title.label: My fav, but bug has popped up
